Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.077143012 0.514825877 0.346102406 0.929172218 0.822033940 0.353011451
#>  [7] 0.003335565 0.370298706 0.868327690 0.229194702 0.040311429 0.851764304
#> [13] 0.397340845 0.153861691 0.393063464 0.370101964 0.074435235 0.701425086
#> [19] 0.395346990 0.510848242
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.49593585 0.92176440 0.46745977 0.71690163 0.93160037 0.40590925
#>  [7] 0.45610102 0.00271664 0.83309099 0.80054907 0.59056969 0.19770062
#> [13] 0.59330536 0.40873728 0.58173084 0.30221701 0.63342094 0.52412803
#> [19] 0.82777490 0.41776856

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.55336133 0.85790225 0.70096545 0.78137507 0.55445401 0.34585256
#>  [7] 0.10230377 0.01849825 0.86855754 0.82191912
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.6966321 0.5513423 0.9231142 0.9711591 0.3893202 0.8076256 0.5943257
#>  [8] 0.9459173 0.5265419 0.9534349
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.31165440 0.16425496 0.06336915 0.68323858 0.76290931 0.94462306
#>  [7] 0.28191954 0.75943110 0.73710457 0.54833285

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.6250254 0.3465492 0.4313965 0.7901470 0.7207193
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.5574200 0.7377789 0.1675011 0.2116533 0.1339596
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.48950701 0.65702865 0.06850414 0.52920919 0.64830383
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.64371675 0.65249284 0.06403222 0.03508302 0.38244927

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.28839548 0.47284309 0.98906154 0.01210147 0.83136472
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.3376780 0.4603766 0.8540985 0.6717018 0.9145883
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.3768557 0.4747364 0.9773055 0.4062924 0.8578389
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.58954743 0.39568327 0.50511234 0.80623457 0.02307983

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.08041843 0.61204406 0.41778607 0.94843351 0.80777176
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.7271017 0.6180673 0.8098370 0.8666706 0.5091786
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.46169404 0.07952654 0.67826438 0.95315792 0.15845963
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.71904900 0.06979458 0.77061354 0.15024354 0.42595311

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.0         2.9          4.5         1.5 versicolor
#> 2          6.1         2.8          4.7         1.2 versicolor
#> 3          5.5         2.3          4.0         1.3 versicolor
#> 4          4.8         3.0          1.4         0.3     setosa
#> 5          6.5         3.0          5.8         2.2  virginica
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.2         2.8          4.8         1.8  virginica
#> 2          5.7         4.4          1.5         0.4     setosa
#> 3          5.8         2.7          4.1         1.0 versicolor
#> 4          6.4         3.1          5.5         1.8  virginica
#> 5          6.0         3.0          4.8         1.8  virginica
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width   Species
#> 1          4.8         3.4          1.9         0.2    setosa
#> 2          7.9         3.8          6.4         2.0 virginica
#> 3          6.7         3.3          5.7         2.1 virginica
#> 4          4.7         3.2          1.3         0.2    setosa
#> 5          5.0         3.6          1.4         0.2    setosa

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           7.7         2.8
#> 2           4.8         3.4
#> 3           5.5         4.2
#> 4           5.0         3.4
#> 5           6.9         3.1
#> 6           5.2         4.1
#> 7           7.1         3.0
#> 8           6.7         3.1
#> 9           7.2         3.2
#> 10          4.9         3.1
#> 11          6.7         3.3
#> 12          5.8         2.6
#> 13          5.3         3.7
#> 14          5.5         2.3
#> 15          7.7         3.0
#> 16          5.1         3.5
#> 17          4.9         2.5
#> 18          7.9         3.8
#> 19          6.7         3.0
#> 20          6.3         2.9

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          7.2         3.6
#> 2          6.0         3.0
#> 3          6.1         3.0
#> 4          6.4         3.2
#> 5          6.5         3.2
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.4         3.2
#> 2          5.0         2.0
#> 3          4.8         3.4
#> 4          4.8         3.0
#> 5          6.1         3.0
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.5         4.2
#> 2          4.9         3.1
#> 3          5.2         4.1
#> 4          5.4         3.7
#> 5          5.5         2.4
